https://horaceheaven.com/android-ormlite-tutorial/

    compile 'com.j256.ormlite:ormlite-core:4.48'
    compile 'com.j256.ormlite:ormlite-android:4.48'
    
https://github.com/stephanenicolas/ormlite-android-gradle-plugin

A Gradle plugin for Android to 
1）generate an ORMLite configuration file and 
2）boost DAOs creations.
